title: Deep Learning Specialization

description: Focuses on NLP techniques like tokenization, embeddings, transformers, and sequence models.

description: Covers the entire ML lifecycle, including deployment, monitoring, and maintenance of ML systems.

title: Advanced Machine Learning Specialization
description: Explores advanced ML topics like Bayesian methods, reinforcement learning, and computer vision.

title: Practical Deep Learning for Coders
description: A practical, code-first approach to deep learning using PyTorch.

title: Hugging Face Transformers Course
description: Learn how to use the Hugging Face Transformers library for NLP tasks.

title: Introduction to TensorFlow for Artificial Intelligence, Machine Learning, and Deep Learning

description: Covers building and deploying LLMs using AWS services.

description: Explores various aspects of generative AI, including LLMs and image generation.
